>

> The transmission was received by the gi-normous craft and a reply
> transmission was sent to Pika-Hawk.
>
> "Thank you, Pika-Hawk, Noble, Penguin, Dark Pika, Dark Rat, Dark
Penguin, > Penguin 2, and Bruiser for entering the IGL's Regular
League.  We have you > all registered and thank you for your
promptness.  We need one last piece of > information for this to be
final.  Are you part of a faction, and if the > answer is yes what is
the name of the faction?  Thanks again."
